job_history.role_name: Senior Advisor and National Fundraising Director
job_history.work_description: Created project plan to implement a new business strategy and organizational structure to optimize workflow, leading team to raise $2.25MM in two months, the largest congressional raise in the country over that period. Led 14-person staff composed of digital marketing, data, communications, and sales teams to surpass engagement and fundraising KPIs. Managed $4.25MM budget and all fundraising-related projects including launching a mobile-compatible website, and an activist-targeted digital marketing campaign that increased engagement across all digital channels by 43%.

job_history.role_name: Campaign and Fundraising Special Projects Advisor
job_history.work_description: Developed budgets, timelines, deliverables, and KPIs for a portfolio of 8 congressional campaigns throughout the Midwest, leading each campaign to increase money raised by at least 100%. Collaborated with heads of event, operations, and fundraising departments to flawlessly execute over 100 appearances from former presidents and high-profile celebrities.

job_history.role_name: Campaign Chief of Staff and Fundraising Director
job_history.work_description: Built and oversaw a $4MM budget and all campaign projects ranging from external communications and fundraising strategies to lawn sign placement. Advised the Congressman on all political decisions and developments involving his re-election efforts.
Led team composed of digital marketing, direct mail, and polling consultants to implement a fundraising strategy that raised $1.4MM, more than any other campaign in NYC over the same time period.
Voted best legal assistant in the litigation department.

job_history.role_name: Office of House Minority Leader Steny Hoyer

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing multiple projects, including creating project plans, leading teams, and surpassing engagement and fundraising KPIs, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Fundraising
skills.explanation: Has a proven track record of successfully leading fundraising efforts, raising millions of dollars, and exceeding fundraising goals, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has managed multi-million dollar budgets and developed budgets for various projects, showing strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams of various sizes, including a 14-person staff, and has experience advising senior leaders, indicating strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Digital Marketing
skills.explanation: Has experience with digital marketing campaigns, including launching a mobile-compatible website and increasing engagement across all digital channels, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience with external communications and has advised senior leaders on political decisions, indicating solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has experience managing teams of various sizes, including a 14-person staff, and has led teams to surpass engagement and fundraising KPIs, showing strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.explanation: Has experience developing project plans, timelines, and deliverables, and has led teams to surpass engagement and fundraising KPIs, showing strong proficiency in strategic planning.
